here's the real trick five minutes per

they're about a really 60% so the trick
here we're gonna wrap them in foil we're

the residual heat is gonna finish

note about the pan here it's too black
to make a pan sauce but we don't need to
because 10 minutes later when I unwrap
those pork chops
see all that beautiful natural juice
that's at the bottom it's all flavored

delicious by the way just because
there's all that juice at the bottom
doesn't mean these are dried out these
rested nicely and they're very moist
inside so there's plenty to spoon over
